c74object.name: bach.rank
c74object.digest: Compute the rank of a matrix
c74object.description: Computes the rank of the incoming matrix.

outlet.digest: The rank of the incoming matrix

method.name: bang
method.description: Outputs the rank of the most recently input matrix.

method.name: llll
method.description:
The object outputs the rank of the incoming matrix.
In the bach environment, a matrix is just a llll having depth two, whose first-level sublllls are the rows of the matrix. For instance the matrix [1 0 0] [0 1 0] [0 0 1] is the 3 by 3 identity matrix. A "good" matrix is supposed to be well formed, i.e. all its rows must have the same length. A matrix is square if the length of the rows (which is the number of columns) is the same as the number of rows.

c74object.discussion:
The determinant of the matrix is computed by Gaussian elimination and then by counting the number of pivots. By convention the rank of null is -1 and the rank of [] is 0.
In the bach environment, a matrix is just a llll having depth two, whose first-level sublllls are the rows of the matrix. For instance the matrix [1 0 0] [0 1 0] [0 0 1] is the 3 by 3 identity matrix. A "good" matrix is supposed to be well formed, i.e. all its rows must have the same length. A matrix is square if the length of the rows (which is the number of columns) is the same as the number of rows.

entry.name: Outlet 1 (int)
entry.description: The rank of the incoming matrix.

entry.name: More details
entry.description:
The determinant of the matrix is computed by Gaussian elimination and then by counting the number of pivots. By convention the rank of null is -1 and the rank of [] is 0.
In the bach environment, a matrix is just a llll having depth two, whose first-level sublllls are the rows of the matrix. For instance the matrix [1 0 0] [0 1 0] [0 0 1] is the 3 by 3 identity matrix. A "good" matrix is supposed to be well formed, i.e. all its rows must have the same length. A matrix is square if the length of the rows (which is the number of columns) is the same as the number of rows.

entry.name: Keywords
entry.description: rank, calculate, compute, Gauss elimination, linear independence, matrix.
